snippet: Gov. Nikki Haley said a report on the state’s child protective system will be useful in better addressing sexual abuse in the state, and she recounted her experience as a physically abused child.
abstract: South Carolina Gov Nikki Haley welcomes privately financed report detailing flaws in state's child protective system; Haley recounts her experience as physically abused child and says report will be useful in better addressing sexual abuse of children in the state.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Nikki Haley said a report on the state’s child protective system will be useful in better addressing sexual abuse in the state, and she recounted her experience as a physically abused child.

headline.main: South Carolina Is Faulted on Child Services
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Is Faulted on Child Services
